title: On the PBE Mordekaiser ultimate Ghost gains gold when you have Targons
body:
I dont know what the ghost wants to spend it on.

But it only happens to people you have ulted so maybe enemies will get the gold?

replies.body: From 5.16 onwards Targon procs that go to clones/ghosts will give the gold to that units controller (so a Shaco clone that gets a Targon proc directed to it will give gold to Shaco, a Morde ghost to Morde etc).

Ohh thats cool so morde gets both the gold from the last hit and the transfer then.

Good to know
